resources.ntasks: Number of tasks, set > 1 for MPI parallelization
resources.ncpus: Number of CPUs per task, set > 1 for multicore/parallel within a task
resources.memory: Memory in MB per CPU, minimum 100

details.queue: Short (other options: batch, highmem, gpu, mygroup)
details.environment: Initialized using source /etc/profile and module load R
